mapper.select: SELECT A.EMP_CD , A.EMP_ID , A.EMP_PW , A.EMP_NM , A.EMP_EML , A.POST , A.ADDR , A.DET_ADDR , A.EMP_TEL , A.EMP_SIGN_DT , A.POSI_CD , A.FAIL_CNT , A.EMP_SIT_CD , A.APPR_SIGN_PATH , A.PROFILE , A.ENABLED , A.DEP_CD , B.AUTH_CD , A.SIGN , A.CO_CD , C.PAY_CD FROM EMPLOYEE A LEFT OUTER JOIN AUTH B ON(A.EMP_CD = B.EMP_CD) LEFT OUTER JOIN COMPANY C ON(A.CO_CD = C.CO_CD) WHERE A.EMP_ID = #{empId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE (EMP_CD , EMP_ID , EMP_PW , EMP_NM , EMP_EML , POST , ADDR , DET_ADDR , EMP_TEL , EMP_SIGN_DT , ENABLED , CO_CD) VALUES ((SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(EMP_CD,7)),0)+1, 'FM000') FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_CD LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||'%') , #{empId} , #{empPw} , #{empNm} , #{empEml} , #{post} , #{addr} , #{detAddr} , #{empTel} , SYSDATE , 0 , (SELECT CO_CD FROM COMPANY WHERE URL = #{coCd}))

INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE( EMP_CD , EMP_ID , EMP_PW , EMP_NM , EMP_EML , EMP_TEL , EMP_SIGN_DT , ENABLED) VALUES((SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(EMP_CD,7)),0)+1, 'FM000') FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_CD LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||'%') , #{empId} , #{empPw} , #{empNm} , #{empEml} , #{empTel} , sysdate , '1')
